species.name: maushold
descriptions: The larger pair protects the little ones during battles. When facing strong opponents, the whole group will join the fight.
The two little ones just appeared one day. The group might be a family of related Pokémon, but nobody knows for sure.

abilities.name: friend-guard
abilities.effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.
